    • Estimation of Intensity-Duration-Frequency (IDF) Curve through L-Moment method

    Vector to Data frame (table) or Tibble

    vec2df.Rd

    Vector to Data frame (table) or Tibble

    vec2df(
  x,
  nn = names(x),
  aggr.name = "aggr",
  index.name = "index",
  dd.name = "dd",
  dd_formatter = "D%03d",
  numeric_dd = TRUE,
  numeric_index = FALSE,
  return_tibble = TRUE
)

    Arguments

    x

    object returned by annual.agg or yearly.agg

    nn

    names of x

    aggr.name, dd.name, index.name

    optional column mane for x. See function usage.

    dd_formatter

    string formatter for duration in the function value

    numeric_dd

    logical. Default is TRUE.

    numeric_index

    logical. Default is FALSE.

    return_tibble

    logical

    See also

    df2vec

    Examples

    
## TO DO
#' 
library(RMAWGEN)
data(trentino)
time <- as.Date(sprintf("%04d-%02d-%02d",PRECIPITATION$year,
PRECIPITATION$month,PRECIPITATION$day),format="%Y-%m-%d")
x <- PRECIPITATION$B8570

out <- annual.agg(x,time)
out2 <- df2vec(out)
out3 <- vec2df(out2)
